live_updates: Our technicians have been able to restore service to roughly half the affected customers and are continuing to work to get the rest online as soon as possible. We appreciate your continued patience. Thank you
Our technicians continue to repair services through the night. We apologize for the extended disruption.

56521.summary: Some customers in the Christie Park area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
56521.title: Dec 28 - Calgary (Christie Park) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
